examples.text: an aversive agent is added, which gives the antifreeze an unpleasant taste
the very thought of cheating or acting immorally is deeply aversive for the virtuous character

definitions: relating to or denoting aversion therapy, a type of behavior therapy designed to make patients give up an undesirable habit by causing them to associate it with an unpleasant effect

examples.text: a program of aversive treatment for criminal offenders
the parents informed the legislators about how aversive therapy saved their child's life
